transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Kamlesh ji baat kar rahe hain?
Ji boliye.
Sir, main Taruna baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se senior manager sir.
Actually aapka ye Maruti Mangla Stone craft ke naam se ticket open hua tha aapki baat hui hogi aapke account manager se sir.
Ji ji abhi ho gaya.
Abhi ho gaya. 
Kya dikkat aa rahi thi sir aapko aapka matlab irrelevancy aa rahi thi keh rahe the aap lead mein.
Irrelevant kya hai na usme problem kya tha usme mein complaint tha ki har bar fiber ka aur resin ka usko related ka aata tha.
Achcha achcha.
To baat kar rahe the ki wo bol rahe the ki usko delete mat kariye har 10 din tak usko delete mat kariye.
To related uska ye aa jayega kyuki aapka by lead bhi kam hote ja raha hai aapne bar bar delete karte to aapka by lead kam hote ja raha hai. 
To delete mat kariye. 
To jaise aayega to recent show karega matlab beech beech mein bhi reh jata hai na jo bhi ye kya aata hai to beech mein reh jata hai recent mein bhi humko show nahi karta hai relevant mein ja ke dekhta hu to bahut reh jata hai to uske andar kahan dhundhe.
To bola theek hai to recent mein check kariye to aa jayega. 
Jab bhi jab bhi aap na jaise open karte ho na open mein aap filter lagao recent ka. 
Recent by lead ka filter laga ke apne product ka jo apna aapka product hai na irrelevant wala jo jo aap jisme aapko chahiye usi ka hi by lead aap consume karo baki jo aapko irrelevant aa rahi hai. 
Jo matlab aapke product se related nahi hai fiber wagera ki hai usko aap other other option aata hai na jab aap not relevant mark karte ho to other option aata hai na ek sabse last mein.
Han.
Jab aap not relevant mark karte ho to usme do teen cheeze puchta hai aap se location puchta hai bahut sare. 
To usko other mariye ya category category mariye. 
Other mariye ya category. 
Usme other other mein ja ke usko submit kar do usme aisa koi dikkat aayega nahi other mein ja ke kar doge to aapka not matlab kam kam karo jyada jyada nahi kam kam by leads not relevant jo hai unko others mein ja ke usko aap update kar do aur agar jaise iske isse related agar aisa kuch aapko lagta hai ki matlab aur kuch agar hai to aapko matlab aur ha sorry aur ha recent mein ja ke consume karna matlab jo aapka product se related by lead hai jis product ka aapko sabse jyada by lead consume karna hai chahiye. 
Us product ko ja ke recent jaise aap Ganesh statues wagera mein karte ho sabse jyada ya God stone statue mein karte ho to uska particular God stone statue keyword dal ke wahan se filter laga ke search karo dekho kitni leads kaise aa rahi hai piche se sir search hota hai na kai bar usme Kamlesh ji search bhi kam aate hain. 
To ho sakta hai us vajah se bhi ho aur humne to aapko maine aapko suggest bhi kiya tha us time pe ki sir aap apna visibility badhao apna TrustSeal service ke liye agar go through karte ho Kamlesh ji to usme aapka do teen cheeze point ye hai ki aapka visibility enhance hota hai aap aap. 
Lekin isme isme kuch buyer ka matlab jaise hum log ko bhi trust hona chahiye ki isme jyada aate hai to usme aur jyada aayenge to isme itna hai hi nahi to isliye trust nahi kar pa rahe na. 
To ek bar huge amount ka ek bar huge amount ka ye mat laga dene ka matlab kuch nahi jaise hum log ko is field mein trust aa jayega ki MDC mein ki kuch kuch aata hai to taki usme bhi kuch jyada aapke buyer ka aapke buyer ka trust build karne ke liye hi to TrustSeal services banai hai na IndiaMART ne. 
Achcha aap ek baat batao jaise aap ho aap matlab usme ho jaise aapne aap IndiaMART ke site pe aaye ya aapne open kara ya kuch bhi hai. 
Jab aapne open kara to aap dekhoge wahan pe aapka jo customer hai ab main as a main buyer aayi maine ek Ganesh statues mein dala mere ko upar se jab maine search kara to search karne pe sir aap dekhoge main ek chalo Ganesh statue ya main God stone statue click karti hu. 
Ab yahan pe mujhe Vijay Marble wale dikh rahe hain aapke Kartik Murti wale dikh rahe hain Jhankar Murti wale dikh rahe hain Siddheshwar Murti wale dikh rahe hain Jaipur Marble Impore wale dikh rahe hain Kavish dikh rahe hain A class stone hai ab ye Vishruta sculptors karke hai Le Royal craft karke hai Savitri Murti art hai ab aap mujhe batao sir as a buyer kya mere paas itna time rahega ki main aise search karti rahu niche jati rahu dekhti rahu ek page do page ki bhai mujhe requirement hai iski main inko requirement main upar se 10 logo ke number dekhungi contact supplier ya view mobile number pe click karungi unko requirement dal dungi. 
Ab yahin pe inki profile pe TrustSeal ka sir ek logo stamp alag se laga hua hai. 
Thik hai to aap agar man lo koi sona kharidne jate ho aap matlab hall mark ka sona dekhte ho hall mark laga to aapko bharosa hota hai na as a buyer ki ye genuine sona hoga. 
To aise hi sir aapke buyer ko aap pe trust kaise dilaya jaye aap ye bhi to sochiye na agar Maruti Mangla wale koi market mein hai main man lo as a buyer aayi maine socha chalo theek hai main inko advance payment karungi mere ko God stone statue ki requirement hai lekin main trust nahi kar pa rahi. 
Samajh gaye aap? 
Ji. 
To wo trust kaise hoga sir wo trust to tabhi hoga na jab aapka jab ab buyer hai sir buyer ke samne agar TrustSeal ka logo stamp aapki profile pe Maruti Mangla ka dikh raha hai to usko ek usko ek bharosa ho raha hai ki ye ek genuine verified supplier hai IndiaMART ka. 
Thik agar main inhen payment karta advance to matlab iski zimmedari aage fir IndiaMART le raha hai ki bhai ha na buyer taki usme na buyer aap se koi fraud kar payega na aap kisi buyer se fraud kar paoge aap. 
Thik hai? 
Ji. 
Thik hai dekhte hain matlab usko kuch bhi. 
Baki dekho aapke upar hai dekho main sir main ye nahi hai ki main aapko kisi tarike se koi matlab galat cheez aapko bolu ye dekho sir suggest karne wali baat hai as a IndiaMART hai ab aap fir aap fir soch ke dekho sir agar market mein IndiaMART agar kisi us pe baitha hai aapko agar main kuch achcha cheeze suggest kar rahi hu to main yahi chahungi na sir ki aapko wo cheez mile wo fact wo achcha ho main aapko ek suggestion ke us pe bol rahi hu sir baki aapke upar hai dekho aapko jaisa wo lena hai kyuki sir dekho aapne paisa lagaya hai agar us paise mein thoda sa aur lag ke agar aapka visibility badh raha hai aapki by leads badh rahi hai aapko inquiry aur jyada aa raha hai to nuksan aapka nahi hoga profit hi hoga sir. 
To hoga isme thoda din chalne dete matlab isme kuch feel ban jaye. 
Sir teen mahine dekho aapka bhi business chalte chalte teen saade teen mahina ho gaya hai ab aap dekh rahe ho ki aapko kai bar by lead jab aap click bhi karte ho bahut sari by lead aapko sold out bhi dikhati hongi kuch aapki already consume ho jati hongi to aap se pehle bhi market mein aur bhi log baithe hai na sir jo by lead consume karke aapke by lead pehle le rahe hain. 
Thik hai? 
Ji. 
Baki dekhiye sir aap is bare mein suggest thoda sa aap dijiye. 
Ji. 
Ek aapka baki ticket open hua tha Kamlesh ji isko main close kar deti hu. 
Thik hai? 
Ji ji ji. 
To hamare liye feedback ke liye aayega sir please usko yes kar dijiyega thik hai? 
Okay. 
Thik Kamlesh ji okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing irrelevant leads in the portal.

- Feels TrustSeal is expensive, unsure of its value.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using filters for relevant leads.

- Executive explained TrustSeal benefits for buyer trust.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will consider TrustSeal service.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, visibility, filters
